pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, May 9, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, May 9, 2016:

Ottawa

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall on global health during which he will make an important announcement related to the Global Fund.

Victoria Hall
111 Sussex Drive
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 11:00 a.m.
  • Media are requested to register and collect badges to access both events at the media desk in the lobby of 111 Sussex.
  • The town hall event will be broadcast live on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CanadaDevelopment


1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will take questions during a press conference following the announcement.

The Sussex Pavilion
111 Sussex Drive
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • A photo opportunity with partners will take place before questions.
  • Partners will also be available to take questions. 


PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
